answers.text:
Hi Izzy, 
Thank you for your question on payment provisions. I was able to find a few documents that may be of use to you as you tackle this issue. 
-Here is a power point on local government revenue that touches on this issue. bookstore.icma.org/freedocs/Rev_Guide_Presentation.ppt
-A Customer Service Policy from the Town of Farmville shows how customer service and associated fees are handled in addition to providing an example delinquent fee. icma.org/Documents/QuestionAnswer/Document/7222
I hope you find these documents useful as you create your own delinquent payment provision policy. 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Izzy Murguia
text:
Does your city have a delinquent payment provision in your city's special events policy/permitting process?  
We have 2 events that still owe money for staff time, and the organizers have not paid but have requested a date for their next event.
title: Special Events Policy
